atk_abil: Normal Attack: Throws his incense brner of death at the enemies, dealing damage to them.
Skill Attack: Hurls a deadly spirit that creates a fatal smoke on a certain area. Enemies within the area of the fatal smoke receive continuous damage until it disappears.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic speed of the game by 5%, increases human movement speed by 5% and critital damage by 5%.
Special Ability 2: Never gets disturbed by the terrain of Stage 10,000 or higher.
Special Ability 3: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.
Innervate 3: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
Battle Cry (Elf): Increases the attack, defense and HP of elf units in Guild Invasion even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Throws his incense brner of death at the enemies, dealing damage to them.
Skill Attack: Hurls a deadly spirit that creates a fatal smoke on a certain area. Enemies within the area of the fatal smoke receive continuous damage until it disappears.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic speed of the game by 11%, increases human movement speed by 7% and attack distance by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Never gets disturbed by the terrain of Stage 10,000 or higher.
Special Ability 3: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.
Innervate 3: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
Battle Cry (Elf): Increases the attack, defense and HP of elf units in Guild Invasion even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).

buffs.description: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Undertaker is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
buffs.name: Innervate 3

buffs.description: Increases the attack, defense and HP of undead units in Guild Invasion even if Undertaker is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).
buffs.name: Battle Cry (Undead)
